plugin.name: Test_build_plugin_ocpn
plugin.summary: A minimal test plugin template to verify build and loading in OpenCPN.
plugin.author: @Mozart
plugin.description: This plugin serves as a simple template for testing the build process and ensuring successful loading into the OpenCPN application. It is intended for developers as a starting point for plugin development, providing only the minimal structure required to validate integration with OpenCPN. No production features are included.
